## `stan`


```{stan, output.var = "stan_example", echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, cache = TRUE}
parameters {
  real y[2];
}
model {
  y[1] ~ normal(0, 1);
  y[2] ~ double_exponential(0, 2);
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(rstan))
```

---

## `stan`

```{r, cache = TRUE, eval = TRUE}
library(rstan)
fit <- sampling(stan_example, refresh = 0)
```


```{r, eval = TRUE}
knitr::kable(summary(fit)$summary, digits = 2, format = 'html', 
             caption = "This are the results from sampling the above model.")
```
